unnormalised: Hey Students, Feeling the pinch? Scholarship portals are your new best friends! Forget slogging through endless notices like it's your JEE prep days. These EdTech platforms are simplifying the scholarship hunt like never before.
normalised: Hey Students, Feeling the pinch? Scholarship portals are your new best friends! Forget slogging through endless notices like it's your J E E prep days. These EdTech platforms are simplifying the scholarship hunt like never before.

unnormalised: Think of it as a Shaadi.com, but for funding your education! Sites like Buddy4Study and Vidyasaarathi are connecting bright sparks like you with tons of opportunities. From Rs. 5000 for that course you wanted to take to hefty scholarships covering entire degrees, there's something for everyone.
normalised: Think of it as a Shaadi dot com, but for funding your education! Sites like Buddy for Study and Vidyasaarathi are connecting bright sparks like you with tons of opportunities. From rupee five thousand for that course you wanted to take to hefty scholarships covering entire degrees, there's something for everyone.

unnormalised: Pro tip: Sign up, fill out your details super accurately (don't slack like you do on updating your Aadhaar!), and keep checking back. New scholarships drop all the time. Many deadlines are approaching fast, some on 26/01/2024 and others around 10:00 AM on 03/02/2024.
normalised: Pro tip: Sign up, fill out your details super accurately (don't slack like you do on updating your Aadhaar!), and keep checking back. New scholarships drop all the time. Many deadlines are approaching fast, some on twenty sixth january two thousand and twenty four and others around ten A M on third february two thousand and twenty four.

unnormalised: Remember that essay competition your didi won back in '08? Now's your chance to shine! These portals even help you prep your applications. Don't wait till the last minute like submitting your assignment at 11:59 PM on 15/03/2024. Good luck! Go ace those scholarships!
normalised: Remember that essay competition your didi won back in two thousand and eight? Now's your chance to shine! These portals even help you prep your applications. Don't wait till the last minute like submitting your assignment at eleven fifty nine P M on fifteenth march two thousand and twenty four. Good luck! Go ace those scholarships!
